name: Docusaurus DocSearch ランキング/重み付け 最小
description: DocSearchクローラー設定でsearchableAttributes/ranking/customRankingを最小設定する雛形。

files.template:
# DocSearch Ranking/Weights (Minimal)

- `searchableAttributes`: hierarchy first, then content
- `ranking`: keep default order with `custom` at the end
- `customRanking`: prefer higher pageRank and deeper headings

Tune based on your docs structure and traffic patterns.
